title: Bug 318397Caching in EclipseSourceType is too aggressive
description: Bug 318397Caching in EclipseSourceType is too aggressive
OB: In fixing a recent Roo related issue (where annotations are resolved too early, before declare parents are done) a cache was introduced into EclipseSourceType (see ensureAnnotationTypesResolved()).The cache needs to be cleared if the set of annotation declarations changesthis can occur even after parsing because declare annotation can change them.
